snippet: On more than one occasion, Dr. Kendall Hansen has tried to dye the tail of Hansen, his nearly white Kentucky Derby colt, blue.
abstract: Dr Kendall Hansen, owner of Kentucky Derby contender Hansen, has tried to dye the tail blue on his nearly white colt on more than one occasion; trainer Mike Maker sees it as a distraction. (M)
lead_paragraph: LOUISVILLE, Ky. -- Dr. Kendall Hansen is a man of many words. Mike Maker, the trainer of Hansen's namesake colt, is just the opposite. ''You ask him, 'How did Hansen work today?' '' said Hansen, who operates a pain management clinic in Crestview Hills, Ky., referring to Maker. ''And he'll say, 'Great.' And then there's a long pause.''

headline.main: New Chapter In the Tale Of the Tail
